texts: Welcome, pilot! Let me show you how to control your ship.
To move the ship, click and drag on the screen, then release to launch it toward your target.
Your main goal is to collect as many points as possible.
Aim carefully and plan your movement to maximize your score.
Each world is connected by constellations in space.
To move to the next world, crash your ship into all  constellations.
Master your control, chase the stars, and reach the highest score.
